GoodieHutType.Name: Inferno Spider Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: These rocks are home to a cluster of Inferno Spiders.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The ground here is a mixture of ash, shattered, blackened bones and warped stones. All the remains of the Inferno Spider's prior victims have been destroyed except for one item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Cacus Giant
GoodieHutType.Description: These volcanic rocks are home to a mighty Cacus Giant.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The ground here is a mixture of ash, shattered, blackened bones and warped stones. All the remains of the Cacus Giant's prior victims have been destroyed except for one item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Cyxel Den
GoodieHutType.Description: This area is quiet. No birds shriek, no rabbits scurry through the underbrush. Despite the quiet you can't help but feel like you are being watched.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Wild Boar Den
GoodieHutType.Description: Bones lay scattered here among the trampled bush and rocks.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Broken Ground
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is broken, as if corpses have pulled themselves out of the earth. But these creatures were never alive, it is the earth itself that has risen up.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Broken Ground
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is broken, as if corpses have pulled themselves out of the earth. But these creatures were never alive, it is the earth itself that has risen up.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Broken Ground
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is broken, as if corpses have pulled themselves out of the earth. But these creatures were never alive, it is the earth itself that has risen up.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Broken Ground
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is broken, as if corpses have pulled themselves out of the earth. But these creatures were never alive, it is the earth itself that has risen up.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Storm Giant Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stand the ruins of an ancient temple... the runes long since worn off the exposed pillars and stone walls. All that remains is crumbled white stone.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: There is an altar at the center of the ruined temple. On it you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Sprite Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A group of Sprites have established their home here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Sprites
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Sprites. Searching their lair you find an item of some value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Forest Home
GoodieHutType.Description: A Treekin Giant protects this area.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden under a tree you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Skewer Wasp Nest
GoodieHutType.Description: Skewer Wasps have established a nest here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Skewer Wasps
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Skewer Wasps. Searching their nest you find an item of some value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Skewer Wasp Nest
GoodieHutType.Description: Skewer Wasps have established a nest here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Skewer Wasps
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Skewer Wasps. Searching their nest you find an item of some value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Demon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Here in this dark place resides a horde of demons.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Within the cave you find an item of value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Demon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Here in this dark place resides a horde of demons.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Within the cave you find an item of value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Demon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Here in this dark place resides a horde of demons.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Within the cave you find an item of value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave Hoarder Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: This dark cavern is the home to a clutch of Cave Hoarders.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Within the cave you find an item of value. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Huntsmans' Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A band of huntsmen have setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The huntsmans' camp contains various animal pelts. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Lost Tomb
GoodieHutType.Description: Stone warriors guard this tomb.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Within the tomb you find a valuable item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Rutting Field
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is little more than torn earth and mud. Making it difficult to move or defend yourself. Though it doesn't appear to affect the beast that lives here.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item. (+1 Fame)
